page.title: 12Southend:School life 2
page.content: At{lunch and play times}the children play games on the playground and on the field.Examples of{games they play are "It","Block","Off Ground Touch" and "Bulldog". Some of the children also sing rhymes for skipping or other games.One example of the rhymes they might sing is: "Apple tart,apple tart,tell me the name of your sweetheart.ABCDEFGHIJK LMNOPQRST,Terry,Terry will you come to tea?Terry,Terry will you marry me? Yes,no,yes,no.True,false,true,false." This is one of the popular skipping rhymes that the girl's often sing. The boys,on the other hand,prefer to play{sports,}like football,cricket and "catch" with a tennis ball.
